answers.answer: Hi!Pain predominantly on the right side can be due to fibromyalgia, chronic fatigue syndrome, severe anemia, spinal nerve compression high up in the cervical spine, ankylosing spondylitis, osteoarthritic changes of the vertebrae, calcium deficiency, low Vit D, electrolyte disturbance, peripheral neuropathy due to diabetes or hypothyroidism or due to bad posture. Lyme and lupus are the other possibilities. Please consult your PCP for primary examination followed by proper referral. Take care!

question: why is there pain and tenderness on my right side?
title: Unknown
